messages.title: More and more Cambridge residents are backing Rod on 12 December because
messages.content:
Rod will defend our shared values
Rod has a clear vision for the city we call home
Rod is one of us

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rod will defend our shared values
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rod believes in building an open, tolerant country where all will prosper. As our MP, he will be the strong voice we need in Parliament standing up for our shared, progressive values.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rod has a clear vision for the city we call home
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rod will lead the national debate on the biggest issues facing our city, including the fight to stop Brexit, fixing our housing and our divided society with a green vision for our future.
Rod has been Cambridge’s MP for over 30 years. He understands the issues and challenges we face on a daily basis because, like you, he faces those very same issues and challenges day in, day out.

issues.brexitEurope: “Labour’s new plan…is designed to appeal to those who voted for Brexit.” “Corbyn refuses to commit Labour to continuing freedom of movement after Brexit.”

community.content: Rod believes in building an open, tolerant country where all will prosper.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rod has been Cambridge’s MP for over 30 years. He understands the issues and challenges we face on a daily basis because, like you, he faces those very same issues and challenges day in, day out.

quotes.text: “Labour’s new plan…is designed to appeal to those who voted for Brexit.”
“Corbyn defends his pledge to stay neutral in second referendum”
“Jeremy Corbyn has again rebuffed the demands of many of his own activists for Labour to become the party of remain.”
“19 Labour MPs who backed the Brexit deal”
“Corbyn refuses to commit Labour to continuing freedom of movement after Brexit.”
“Mr Corbyn says Labour will negotiate a Brexit deal.”
“More [Labour] activists are set to be moved to Leave areas.”

images.caption: Rod Cantrill speaking with a resident

examples: “19 Labour MPs who backed the Brexit deal”
“Labour’s new plan…is designed to appeal to those who voted for Brexit.”

“Corbyn refuses to commit Labour to continuing freedom of movement after Brexit.”
“Labour is not a Remain party.”
“Mr Corbyn says Labour will negotiate a Brexit deal.”
“More [Labour] activists are set to be moved to Leave areas.”
Rod believes in building an open, tolerant country where all will prosper.

Rod will defend our shared values. 
Rod has a clear vision for the city we call home. 
Rod is one of us.
